channel.title: TruTV on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TruTV on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: TNT Sports Quadruples Down on Savannah Bananas, Will Televise Banana Ball Championship
item.description: TNT Sports will run 19 Banana Ball games this season, near four times as many games as it did last year, including the first ever tour championship.
